content:
KeyType Enum

Definition

Defines the key types for the stem.IdentityModel.Metadata.KeyDescriptor.Use* property.

In this Article

public enum KeyType
Inheritance
Object
ValueType
System.Enum
KeyType

Fields

Encryption

The key is used for encryption.
Signing

The key is used for signing.
Unspecified

The key type is not specified.
